content.content:
`.categories`

Use the **categories** resource to create, read, update and delete categories (taxonomy) in
a merchant's store, you can edit all category properties and also work with all
category subresources directly at this resource

meta.description: Translated full category name - Max length: **255**
Optional subtitle intended to be used for SEO or layout purposes - Max length: **255**
Slug to complete page URL, starting with number or lowercase letter - Max length: **255** - RegEx pattern: **`^[a-z0-9]([a-z0-9-_./]+)?$`**
Permanent URL to category page - Max length: **255** - Format: **uri**
Optional URL specific to mobile devices - Max length: **255** - Format: **uri**
Short category description in plain text - Max length: **255**
Full category description, may use HTML tags - Max length: **250000**
Full category description, plain text only - Max length: **250000**
Title tag for page SEO - Max length: **255**
Meta description tag for page SEO - Max length: **1000**
Category page slug - Max length: **255** - RegEx pattern: **`^[a-z0-9]([a-z0-9-_./]+)?$`**
List of categories daughters of this category - Max elements: **200**
Category page slug - Max length: **255** - RegEx pattern: **`^[a-z0-9]([a-z0-9-_./]+)?$`**
Grids for results filtering and products composition, `grid_id` as property name - Max properties: **200**
Grid used to results filtering (search aggregations)
Image size (width x height) in px, such as 100x50 (100px width, 50px height) - Max length: **11** - RegEx pattern: **`^[1-9]([0-9]+)?x[1-9]([0-9]+)?$`**
Alternative text, HTML alt tag (important for SEO) - Max length: **255**
List of category images - Max elements: **50**
Tag to identify object, use only lowercase letters, digits and underscore - Max length: **20** - RegEx pattern: **`^[a-z0-9_]+$`**
Image size (width x height) in px, such as 100x50 (100px width, 50px height) - Max length: **11** - RegEx pattern: **`^[1-9]([0-9]+)?x[1-9]([0-9]+)?$`**
Alternative text, HTML alt tag (important for SEO) - Max length: **255**
List of custom attributes - Max elements: **100**
String to help distinguish who (or which app) created and can use the metafield - Max length: **30**
Flags to associate additional info - Max elements: **10**
Optional notes with additional info about this category - Max length: **255**

content.content:
*/categories.json?limit&offset&sort&fields\&[field]* > Authentication
_GET_: **none** Use [default URL parameters](#introduction/overview/url-params) (metadata) for pagination and ordering, you can use any other parameter to query by particular object properties

meta.description: Max number of objects to return
meta.title: number

content.content:
*/categories.json* > Authentication
_POST_: **required** Request body must obey the specifications of [this model](#reference/categories/category-object)

*/categories/[_id].json* > Authentication
_GET_: **none**
_PATCH_, _PUT_, _DELETE_: **required** In read requests, response body will follow [this model](#reference/categories/category-object) For overwriting and editing, request body must obey the same specifications, but especially for edit requests there are no required fields
